Letter, Reuben Gatward to Polly : life on the goldfields.
Letter, Reuben Gatward to Polly : life on the goldfields.
note: Please note: Some of the metadata for this document has been taken from the Museum Victoria catalogue.

title: Letter, Reuben Gatward to Polly : life on the goldfields.
note: The letter is written on a wrapper for 'The Polygot Newsletter, a Summary in English, French, German and Spanish, for Transmission to Europe'. The Polygot was printed and published for the proprietors at the 'Punch' Office, Melbourne, October 1858. The wrapper has an etching of 'View on the Yarra near Dight's Mills' by F. Grusse on the front. The newsletter is an early example of a publication produced in several different languages; an indication of the 'multi-cultural' nature of the population of Victoria in the 1850s.

title: Letter, Reuben Gatward to Polly : life on the goldfields.

Shipboard diary, Walter Dutton, England to Australia, 1858.
Shipboard diary, Walter Dutton, England to Australia, 1858.
note: Please note: Some of the metadata for this document has been taken from the Museum Victoria catalogue.

title: Shipboard diary, Walter Dutton, England to Australia, 1858.
note: The Sarah Dixon was built at the Dixon shipyard on the Tantramar River in Sackville, New Brunswick, Canada, and launched on 18 September 1856. It made only two voyages to Australia. The first left Liverpool on 13 June 1857 under W. Salt as Master and arrived at Port Phillip Bay on 12 September 1857, returning to Britain via Guam. The second voyage, on which Walter Dutton travelled, departed Liverpool on 29 August 1858, again under W. Salt, and arrived at Port Melbourne on 6 December 1858. It was carrying 9 first-class and 190 intermediate & steerage class passengers and a cargo of machinery. The Sarah Dixon departed Melbourne on 17 January 1859 bound for Bassein under ballast. In March 1859, the ship struck Baroguy Shoal in the Gulf of Marinban, near Rangoon, Burma and was a total loss.

title: Shipboard diary, Walter Dutton, England to Australia, 1858.

title: Tract on astrology and magic : manuscript.
Tract on astrology and magic : manuscript.
note: Incipit (folio 1b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Aḥkām sabʻah lil-sāʻah wa-sharāʼiṭuhā wa-ṣifatuhā ṣifat al-shams. Wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Faṣl fī maʻrifat kitāb al-sāʻah al-khabar wa-huwa al-sabʻah al-sāmiʻ li-ayyām al-sabʻah wa-mā yakhtaṣṣu bihimā. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: Wa-Huwa alladhī jaʻala lakum al-nujūma li-tahtadū bihā fī ẓulumāti al-barri wa-al-baḥri. Wa-huwa kawkab allatī fī ayyām al-sabʻah. Wa-iʻlam waffaqaka Allāh taʻālá wa-arshadaka al-taqwá bi-anna al-sāʻah al-awwal min yawm al-Aḥad li-sāʻat al-shams, wa-huwa taṭlaʻu fī falak al-rābiʻ wa-yuqīmu fī burūj shahr ..."

title: 880-02 Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm al-Barrādī.
note: Name of copyist and place and date of copying not mentioned, probably from the 18th century.

title: 880-02 Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm al-Barrādī.
880-02 Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm al-Barrādī.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma yassir ʻalaynā. al-Ḥamdu lillāh fāṭir al-sābiʻayn al-samāʼ wa-al-arḍ, al-mūjid al-mūjadayn al-jism wa-al-ʻarḍ, alladhī jaʻala al-khalq mutadāwalan bayna al-ifnāʼ wa-al-ījād, muwaḥḥidan bayna ʻālam al-iṣlāḥ wa-ʻālam al-ifsād [crossed over] al-fasād, wa-khaṣṣa al-ʻālam al-mukallaf bi-al-ishqāʼ wa-al-isʻād, wa-jaʻala al-ʻilm afḍal wa-afkhar al-makāsib ..."

title: 880-02 Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm al-Barrādī.
note: Script: In large clear naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; the verses of the poem "al-Daʻāʼim"; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

title: 880-02 Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm al-Barrādī.

title: 880-02 Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm al-Barrādī.
note: On folio 2a: "Kitāb al-Ḥāʼim, Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Abī al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm al-Barrādī al-Maghribī al-Nafūsī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-ghafara la-hu wa-li-jamīʻ al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt, innahu huwa al-ghafūr al-raḥīm. Katabahu al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻĀmir ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥubaysh(?) al-Samadī al-Nazwī."

title: 880-02 Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm al-Barrādī.
note: On folio 2a: A statement dated 9 Ṣafar 1243 of the Hijrah (1 September 1827), as follows: "Tārīkh wuṣūlinā al-Yaman yawm 9 Ṣafar, sanat 1243".

title: 880-02 Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm al-Barrādī.
note: Title from folio 5a: "... wa-sammaytuhu 'Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim' ..."

title: 880-02 Shifāʼ al-ḥāʼim fī sharḥ baʻḍ al-Daʻāʼim : manuscript / Abū al-Qāsim ibn Ibrāhīm al-Barrādī.
note: Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with a long poem on ritual purity "Wa-qāla fī al-wuḍūʼ wa-al-tayammum wa-ghasl al-najāsāt wa-al-ightisāl wa-al-janābah wa-aḥkām al-ṭahārāt": "... Kaʼannamā al-saṭru idhā shumtahu // yusirru bi-al-ḍiḥki ilá al-saṭri. Ka-ʻiqdi ghaydāʼ ʻalá naḥrihā // mufaṣṣalun bi-al-durri wa-al-shadhri. Tammat."

title: 880-02 al-Naḥw wa-tafsīr shayʼ min al-Qurʼān : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥaddādī.
note: Name of copyist and place and date of copying not mentioned, probably from the 18th century.

title: 880-02 al-Naḥw wa-tafsīr shayʼ min al-Qurʼān : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥaddādī.
880-02 al-Naḥw wa-tafsīr shayʼ min al-Qurʼān : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥaddādī.
note: Incipit: "Kitāb al-Ḥaddādī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-faqīh al-Imām al-mufassir al-zāhid Abū Naṣr Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Rashdān (?) ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥaddādī: Lammā faraghtu min taṣnīf kitābī al-Mūḍiḥ li-ʻilm al-Qurʼān ṣannaftu kitābī hādhā minnī li-waladī wa-li-sāʼir al-Muslimīn wa-jaʻaltuhu madkhalan li-tafsīr Kitāb Allāh wa-maʻānīhi, wa-tanbīhan ʻalá ṭuruqihi wa-mabānīhi, wa-raddan ʻalá al-mulḥidīn wa-al-ṭāʻinīn fī Kitāb Allāh ..."

title: 880-02 al-Naḥw wa-tafsīr shayʼ min al-Qurʼān : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥaddādī.
note: Colophon (flolio 137a): "Tamma Kitāb 'al-Naḥw wa-tafsīr shayʼ min al-Qurʼān', bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Mannān. Nasʼalu Allāh al-salāmah min al-ʻiṣyān wa-al-najāh min al-nīrān, innahu karīmun mannān, raḥīmun raḥmān, wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻaẓīm."

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: Copied on Tuesday evening, five days remaining from the month of Ṣafar, of the year 1123 of the Hijrah (14 April 1711), by Sulaymān ibn Rabīʻ (?) ibn Ḥarmal (?) ibn Ḥamad al-ʻĀmirī, for his patron, Sulṭān ibn al-Imām Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Mālik al-Yaʻrubī. Place of copying not mentioned.

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Rabbi Yassir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala lil-ʻāshiqīn bi-aḥkām al-gharām riḍan, wa-ḥabbaba ilayhim al-mawt fī ḥubb man yahwawnahu, fa-lā takun yā fatá bi-al-ʻadhli muʻtariḍan, fa-kam fīhim min ʻāshiqin wa-muḥibbin ṣādiq. Shiʻran: Raʼá fa-ḥabba fa-rāma al-waṣla fa-imtanaʻū // fa-sāma ṣabran fa-aʻyā nayluhu fa-qaḍá ..."

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: Layout: In single column of 14 lines.

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Dīwān al-ṣabābah, li-mālikihi al-faqīr lillāh ʻazza wa-jall, Sulṭān ibn al-Imām Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Mālik al-Yaʻrubī. Katabahu mālikuhu bi-yadihi." Under it: "Hādhā al-kitāb li-mālikihi, Imām al-Muslimīn, Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Mālik al-Yaʻrubī. Katabahu mālikuhu bi-yadihi. Tārīkh kitābī hādhā yawm al-Ithnayn, arbaʻah wa-ʻishrīn Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat 1127 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [29 April 1715]."

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: On Folio 1a: A partially legible ownership statement: "Intaqala hādhā al-kitāb bi-al-shirāʼ al-ṣaḥīḥ min Sūq al-Rustāq [obliterated words]."

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: On folios 2a-3b: Miscellaneous quotations in poetry and prose.

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: On folio 4a: "Hādhā Kitāb 'Dīwān al-ṣabābah', taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-fāḍil, al-adīb al-ʻallāmah, Shihāb al-Dīn Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Abī Ḥajalah al-Tilimsānī, lil-Sayyid al-Mawlá al-muʻaẓẓam Sulṭān ibn Imām al-Muslimīn Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf al-Yaʻrubī, khallada Allāh mulkahum. Katabahu ʻabduhu Salmān ibn Sayf ibn Salmān bi-yadihi."

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: Decooration: Headings and markings in red.

title: 880-03 Dīwān al-ṣabābah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Abī Ḥajalah.
note: Colophon (flolio 208a-208b): "Hunā intahá ākhir 'Dīwān al-ṣabābah' li-Ibn Abī Ḥajalah, wa-nuqila min nuskhatin bi-khaṭṭ al-Shaykh al-adīb al-fāḍil Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Shādhilī, al-shahīr al-maʻrūf bi-al-Badr al-Sinānī (?). Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb, ʻashīyat al-thulāthāʼ, li-khamsin baqyat min Ṣafar, sanat thalāth wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah wa-alf <sanah> min Hijrat al-Nabī Muḥammad [14 April 1711], Ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ālihi, wa-sallam, ʻalá yaday al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Sulaymān ibn Rabīʻ (?) ibn Ḥarmal (?) ibn Ḥamad al-ʻĀmirī, nasakhahu li-makhdūmihi wa-sayyidihi wa-muʻlī yadihi wa-rabbi niʻmatihi wa-kāshif ghummatihi, Sulṭān ibn al-Imām Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Mālik al-Yaʻrubī, aṭāla Allāh aʻmārahumā, wa-adāma ʻizzahumā, wa-manaʻa al-khuṭūb an tabuzzahumā, innahu jawwādun karīm. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm." Around the colophon (in red): "Tamma. Tamma. Tamma. Wa-kāna taḥbīruhu ʻalá yaday ʻabdihi, wa-asīr jūdihi, wa-ʻarīf iḥsānihi, al-shākir faḍlahu, Sulaymān ibn Sayf ibn Sulaymān ibn Bashīr al-Mighfarī (?) [one word torn]. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min dhālika yawm 10 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1123 [18 April 1711]."

title: 880-03 Qaṣīdat al-Burdah : manuscript / Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Būṣīrī.
note: Name of copyist and place and date of copying not mentioned, probably from the 18th century.

title: 880-03 Qaṣīdat al-Burdah : manuscript / Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Būṣīrī.
880-03 Qaṣīdat al-Burdah : manuscript / Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Būṣīrī.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, fakhr al-udabāʼ, jamāl al-bulaghāʼ, Sharaf al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Dulāṣī thumma al-Būṣīrī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi: Kāna sabab inshāʼī hadhihi al-qaṣīdah al-mubārakah annī kuntu qad aṣābanī khaliṭ fālij abṭala niṣfī wa-lam antafiʻ bi-hi, fa-fakkartu an aʻmala qaṣidatan fī madḥ al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, astashfiʻu bi-hi ilá Allāh, ʻazza wa-jall, fa-anshaʼtu hādhihi al-qaṣīdah, wa-numtu, fa-raʼyatu al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī al-manām, fa-masaḥa ʻalayya bi-yadihi al-mubārakah, fa-ʻūfītu li-waqtī ..."

title: 880-03 Qaṣīdat al-Burdah : manuscript / Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Būṣīrī.

note: Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts as follows: "... ʻalayhi wa-inna al-jumlah aʻamm min al-kalām, fa-kull kalām jumlah wa-lā yanʻakis, alā tará anna naḥwa jumlat In qāma Zaydun fī qawlika In qāma Zaydun qāma ʻAmr, wa-summiya jumlatan wa-lā yusmmá kalāman li-annahu lā yaḥsunu al-sukūt ʻalayhi, thumma inna al-jumlah tusammá ismīyah in budiʼat bi-ism ..."

note: Colophon (flolio 15b): "Wa-fī hādhā al-qadr fī hādhā al-mukhtaṣar kifāyah li-mutaʼammilihi. Lillāh al-ḥamd wa-al-minnah. Bi-ismihi, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, faragha min kitābatihi al-ʻabd al-muftaqir ʻAlī fī yawm al-Jumʻah [crossed over] al-Sabt, fī waqt al-ẓuhr, fī Qaryat Jizkī (?). al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ḥamdan yuwāfī niʻamah wa-yukāfī mazīdah, wa-ṣallá Allāh taʻālá ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi jamīʻan. Āmīn. Yā Muʻīn."

880-02 Khizānat al-akhyār fī sharḥ buyūʻāt al-khiyār : manuscript / Khamīs ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻAlī.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir, Yā Karīm. Mimmā anshaʼahu al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah, waḥīd dahrihi wa-nasīj waḥdihi, Qāḍī al-Muslimīn Khamīs ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻAlī, raḥimahu Allāh. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anṭaqa bi-al-ḥikamah alsun al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻārifīn, wa-jalā ghishāwat al-shakk ʻan abṣār baṣāʼir al-ʻuqalāʼ al-khāʼifīn, wa-kashafa ḥujub al-yaqīn ʻan aʻyun qulūb al-awliyāʼ al-muhtadīn ... wa-sammaynāhu bi-kitāb 'Khizānat al-akhyār fī sharḥ buyūʻāt al-khiyār' ..."

title: 880-02 Khizānat al-akhyār fī sharḥ buyūʻāt al-khiyār : manuscript / Khamīs ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻAlī.
note: Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak al-musammá bi-Khizānat al-akhyār fī buyūʻāt al-khiyār, bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-jabbār al-ʻazīz al-ghaffār, wa-kāna ṣadara hādhā al-kitāb bi-khaṭṭ mālikihi al-ʻĀlim al-ʻāmil ... Khamīs ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻAlī ... wa-kāna dhālika fī sabʻ wa- [... ... ...] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah ... wa-kāna tamāmuhu min nuskhah bi-khaṭṭ muʼallifihi al-Faqīh ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad ibn Ghassān ibn Muḥammad (?) ... Katabahu al-faqīr lillāh al-Ghanī ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mubārak ibn ʻUmar ibn Hilāl ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Murtajī (?) ... wa-kāna yawmiʼdhin fī khidmat al-Malik ... Nāṣir ibn Murshid ibn Mālik ... al-Yaʻrubī, amaddahu Allāh taʻālá bi-suʻūd ayyāmih ... bi-ḥurmat Sayyid al-Mursalīn wa-al-Rūḥ al-Amīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhimā, wa-ʻalá ālihi ajmaʻīn."

title: 880-02 Ḥall al-Mūjiz : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Aqsarāʼī.
note: Copied on Monday 18 Dhū al-Qaʻdah of the year 1126 of the Hijrah (25 November 1714). Name of copyist, etc. obliterated.

title: 880-02 Ḥall al-Mūjiz : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Aqsarāʼī.
880-02 Ḥall al-Mūjiz : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Aqsarāʼī.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal anbiyāʼihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, <fa-inna ṭalab> fa-inna al-ṭibb ʻilmun sharīf li-sharaf mawḍūʻihi wa-wathāqat dalāʼilihi, wa-shiddat al-ḥājah ilayhi, wa-fī al-ishtighāl bi-hi min al-thawāb al-jazīl mā lā yūṣafu, li-taḍammunihi iẓhār athār raḥmat Allāh taʻālá ʻalá ʻibādihi, wa-al-tawassul bi-hi ilá irāḥat nufūsihim ʻan al-asqām, fa-li-dhālika ṣaraftu baʻḍ zaman taḥṣīlī ilayhi, wa-qaraʼtu al-mukhtaṣarāt al-mashhūrah fīhi ʻalá wālidī ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Ḥall al-Mūjiz, li-annahu yaḥullu mā fīhi min al-mushkilāt wa-al-mulghazāt, wa-mā tawfīqī illā billāh, ʻalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unīb ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥall al-Mūjiz : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Aqsarāʼī.
note: Script: In good naskh script; in black ink, on polished white paper; catchwords.

note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad alladhī istanqadhanā bi-hi min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam, wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām. Wa-baʻda hādhā, fa-al-gharaḍ min hādhā al-kitāb dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-faḍāʼilihā, nadhkuruhā maḥfūdhat al-asānīd li-yashula ḥifẓuhā ʻalá al-qārī ..."

Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻulūm ʻalá tashaʻʻub funūnihā wa-takaththur shujūnihā arfaʻ al-maṭālib wa-anfaʻ al-maʼārib, wa-ʻilm al-manṭiq min baynihā abyanuhā tibyānan wa-aḥsanuhā shaʼnan ..."

note: Colophon: "Wāfaqa al-farāgh min taswīd hādhihi al-suṭūr min hādhā al-kitāb al-mawsūm bi-al-Maṭāliʻ, li-khulāṣat al-ikhwān, al-Shaykh al-taqī al-naqī, wa-al-raḍī al-murḍī, al-Shaykh Yūsuf ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī ibn Jaʻfar al-Barbūrī al-Awālī, ʻalá yad aqall al-ʻibād ʻamalan wa-aktharihim zalalan, gharīq baḥr al-khaṭāyā wa-al-dhunūb, Yaʻqūb ibn Muḥammad ibn Hidāyah al-Qazwīnī (?) al-Awālī, taḥrīran bi-al-yawm al-thānī ʻashar min shahr Shaʻbān, khutima bi-al-khayr wa-al-ruḍwān, aḥad shuhūr sanat al-thāminah wa-al-miʼah baʻda al-alf Hijrīyah Nabawīyah [6 March 1697], ʻalá muhājirihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad Nabīyihi alladhī intaqadhnā bi-hi min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām. Wa-baʻda hādhā, fa-al-gharaḍ fī hādhā al-kitāb dhikra [al-ṣalāh] ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-faḍāʼiluhā, nadhkuruhā maḥdhūfat al-asānīd, li-yashula ḥifẓuhā ʻalá al-qāriʼ ..."

Faraghtu minhā ḥāmidan muṣalliyan musalliman Yā Rabbu fa-irḥam man ʻalá kātibihi taraḥḥuman." Araound the colophon: "Ayā qāriʼa khaṭṭī saʼaltuka daʻwatan ilá Allāhi lil-ʻabdi al-musīʼi bi-fiʻlihi li-yaghfira Allāhu lī dhanbī wa-yamḥū khaṭīyatī wa-yarziqanī rizqan mughnian (?)."

title: Treatise on "Nifās" and "Ḥayḍ" according to Islamic law : manuscript.
Treatise on "Nifās" and "Ḥayḍ" according to Islamic law : manuscript.
Treatise on "Nifās" and "Ḥayḍ" according to Islamic law : manuscript.
note: Incipit of Section 1. The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... al-nifās laysa la-hu aqall. Wa-qāla wa-qad rufiʻa ilaynā fī al-Ḥadīth anna al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāla 'Lā nifās aqall min usbūʻayn'. Wa-law lam naʻlam hādhā al-Ḥadīth ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ṣaḥīḥan lā akhadhnā bi-hi. Wa-qāla wa-qad rufiʻa ilaynā ʻan Abī Manṣūr annahu qāla aqall al-nifās mā ṭahurat ʻalayhi fī awwal walad waladathu. Wa-Allāh aʻlam ..."

title: Treatise on "Nifās" and "Ḥayḍ" according to Islamic law : manuscript.
note: Incipit of Section 2: "Masʼalah manqūlah min khaṭṭ al-Shaykh al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah Ṣāliḥ ibn Waḍḍāḥ, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-ammā al-amah idhā ḥāḍat ḥayḍatan wa-inqaṭaʻa ʻanhā al-dam fa-jāʼizun tazwījuhā wa-tasarrīhā, li-annahu qāla baʻḍ al-Muslimīn al-istibrāʼ bi-ḥayḍah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-huwa qawlun min aqwāl al-Muslimīn, wa-qawl ḥattá taḥīḍa ḥayḍatayn. Wa-man akhadha bi-al-qawl al-awwal lam naqul innahu rakab (?) majar (?). Mā katabahu Ṣāliḥ ibn Waḍḍāḥ bi-yadihi naqaltuhu kamā wajadtuhu ..."

title: Treatise on "Nifās" and "Ḥayḍ" according to Islamic law : manuscript.
note: Incipit of Section 3 (Preceded by a table of contents): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb fī ṣifat al-ḥayḍ wa-dam al-istiḥāḍah. Qāla Abū al-Muddaththir: Dam al-ḥayḍ damun ghalīẓ aswad asyas lā yakādu yakhruju min al-thawb idhā ghusila. Wa-qad dhukira lanā anna ʻĀʼishah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhā, kānat idhā ightasalat fa-baqiya la-hu athar fa-ghayyarathu bi-shayʼ min ṣufrah. Wa-dam al-istiḥāḍah damun raqīq aḥmar. Hādhā naḥfaẓ. Wa-Allāh aʻlam ..."

title: Treatise on "Nifās" and "Ḥayḍ" according to Islamic law : manuscript.
note: Colophon of Section 1: "Tamma naskh hādhā al-juzʼ ḍuḥá al-Jumʻah, wa-thamāniyah wa-ʻishrīn min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat sitt sinīn wa-arbaʻīn sanah baʻda alf sanah min Hijrat al-Nabī [23 April 1637], ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Naskhahu Khalaf ibn Muḥammad ibn Khalaf al-Kindī al-Nazwī thumma al-Naḥlī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt. Nasakhahu li-nafsihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī, wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm al-ʻAẓīm."

title: Treatise on "Nifās" and "Ḥayḍ" according to Islamic law : manuscript.
note: Colophon of Section 2: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... fa-li-tajʻal ṭuhrahā ʻashrat ayyām wa-ḥayḍahā khamsat ʻashar yawman, fa-tumsiku min al-khamsat ʻashar al-yawm al-ḥayḍ ʻan al-ṣawm wa-ʻan al-ṣalāh ʻashrat ayyām, wa-tuṣallī khamsat ʻashar yawman wa-taṣūm. Fa-idhā qaḍat al-ṣawm ʻalá dhālika wa-arādat al-badal badal al-ʻashr allatī kānat taḥsabuhā ḥayḍan alḥaqat maʻahā badal khamsat ayyām ḥattá tatimma khamst ʻashar yawman, fa-takūnu dhālika istiḥāḍah minhā. Wa-ammā in iʻtaddat fa-ʻanāhā hādhā jaʻalat ḥayḍahā khamsat ʻashar yawman wa-al-ṭuhr shahran. Qāla wa-idhā ʻarafat waqt ummihā fa-huwa lahā, wa-bi-hi taʼkhudhu fī al-ʻiddah al-ṣalāh wa-al-ṣawm ..."

title: Treatise on "Nifās" and "Ḥayḍ" according to Islamic law : manuscript.
note: Colophon of Section 3: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... Qultu kayfa naṣnaʻu. Fa-ʻalá mā waṣfta, fa-alladhī ʻarafnā fī dhālika annahā idhā mudda bihā al-dam baʻda ayyām ḥayḍihā, wa-kāna dhālika al-dam sāʼilan aw qāṭiran aw fāʼiḍan muttaṣilan bihā intaẓarat yawman aw yawmayn, mukhayyarah fī dhālika, taqʻudu fī intiẓārihā ʻinda al-ṣalāh wa-al-ṣawm. Fa-inn mudda bihā al-dam fawqa al-yawm aw al-yawmayn fa-qad qāla man qāla inna ʻalayhā badal ..." Followed by three blank leaves.

title: 880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.
880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.

note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-bāhirah āyātuhu, al-qāhirah saṭawātuhu, al-qadīm iḥsānuhu, al-ʻaẓīm sulṭānuhu, al-sābighah mawāhibuhu, al-sāʼighah mashāribuhu, al-wāsiʻ jūduhu, al-qāmiʻ waʻīduhu ..."

note: Script: In medium clear naskh script; in black ink, on white polished paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

title: 880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.
880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.
note: Binding: In dark brown leather, Type III (without flap); cover embossed with central medallion.

title: 880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.
note: On folio 1a (in red): "Kitāb 'Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ', taʼlīf al-ʻabd al-mushfiq min dhanbih, al-rājī raḥmat Rabbihi, Abī ʻAlī al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Sayyid Abī al-Qāsim al-Faḍl ibn Abī Jaʻfar Yaḥyá ibn Abī Yaḥyá ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Jaʻfar al-ʻAlawī al-Ḥusaynī, ʻufiya ʻanhu. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.
note: On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Mimmā intaẓama fī silk milk al-faqīr ilayhi taʻālá Aḥmad ibn Nāṣir al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī Biqāʻī Zādah al-Shāmī, min khaṭṭ yadihi, ʻufiya ʻanhum. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.
note: On folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Waqf"; An illegible endowment stamp; two illegible round stamps; and large round ownership stamp "Min mutamallakāt al-faqīr al-Ḥājj Muṣṭafá Ṣidqī ghufira la-hu".

title: 880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.
note: Colophon (folio 131b): "Kātibuhu al-mustamidd min baḥr karamihi taʻālá wa-iḥsānih, wa-al-lāʼidh bi-aʻtābih, wa-al-mustafīḍ min ʻalī jinābih, Aḥmad ibn Nāṣir al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī Biqāʻī al-Shāmī, bi-Madīnat Qusṭanṭīnīyah, li-thamān layālin baqīna min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, al-munsalikh min libās sanat tisʻ wa-thalāthīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [11 July 1727], amaddahum Allāh bi-al-ʻafw wa-al-ghufrān, maʻa al-mukhliṣīn min al-ikhwān. Āmīn, Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. M."

title: 880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.
note: On folios 132b-134a: A poem in 65 verses, by Kīwān Zādah Aḥmad Bīk Afandī al-Sharjī (could not be identified). Starts with: Aarjū min al-ilmāmi bi-al-ṭalali al-bālī // li-mā biya iblālan wa-dhālika ablá lī ..." And ends with: "Aḥabbu ilá qalbī min al-khuldi mawṭinan // idhā ḥāwalū fī al-khuldi dhillata amthālī." With the following note (in another hand): "Qad intahat hādhihi al-qaṣīdah al-gharrāʼ al-mushtamilah ʻalá al-faṣāḥah wa-al-balāghah wa-insijām al-alfāẓ maʻa ḥusn al-ṣiyāghah bi-khaṭṭ yad munshiʼihā wa-nāẓimihā wa-ʻāmir riyāḍihā bi-badīʻ naghamāt ḥamāʼimihā akhīnā al-karīm wa-ṣadīqinā al-ḥamīm al-bāriʻ al-fāḍil wa-al-lawdhaʻī al-kāmil Kīwān Zādah Aḥmad Bīk Afandī al-Sharjī, ḥarasa Allāh dhātahu ḥaythu kāna, wa-abqāhu bi-khayr wa-iḥsān, bi-jāh al-Nabī, ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

title: 880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.
note: On folio 139a-139b: Miscellaneous anecdotes in prose and poetry.

title: 880-02 Naḍrat al-ighrīḍ fī nuṣrat al-qarīḍ : manuscript / al-Muẓaffar ibn al-Faḍl al-Ḥusaynī.
note: On folio 139b: An ownership statement: "Min mutamallakāt Aḥmad Biqāʻī Zādah, min khaṭṭihi, ʻufiya ʻanhu."

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: Copied on Friday, twelve nights having passed from the month of Muḥarram of the year 1127 of the Hijrah (18 January 1715), by Maḥbūb ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻīd ibn Rāshid al-Miʻwalī, during the reign of al-Imām Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn al-Imām Sulṭān ibn Sayf al-Yaʻrubī, for al-Shaykh Aḥmad ibn Sulaymān ibn Aḥmad al-ʻĀtī al-Manaḥī. Place of copying not mentioned.

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: Incipit (folio 10b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā tudrikuhu al-aʻyun muawjūdan, wa-lā taṣifuhu al-alsun maḥdūdan, wa-lā yukayyifuhu al-fikr maʻdūdan, wa-lā taʻrifuhu al-khalīqah wālidan wa-lā mawlūdan, aḥmaduhu ʻalá niʻamihi wa-ālāʼih, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá ḥusn qisamihi wa-balāʼihi, wa-aʻūdhu bi-hi min niqamihi wa-ibtilāʼihi, ḥamdan ithra ḥamd, wa-ʻawdan baʻda budūwin ..."

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: Script: In fair large naskh script; in black ink, on white polished paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: Decoration: Headings and markings in red.

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: Inside the front cover: An ownership statement: "Hādhā al-kitāb mulkan lī, wa-anā Muḥammad ibn Jumʻah ibn ʻĀmir ibn Ṣāliḥ al-ʻĀtī, wa-katabtuhu bi-yadī." And a reader's statement: "Badaʼnā bi-qirāʼat hādhā al-kitāb yawm 13 Ramaḍān, sanat 1249 [24 January 1834]. Katabahu Saʻīd ibn Sālim bi-yadihi."

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: On folio 6b-7a: A poem attributed to the author, starts as follows: "Wa-qāla Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī: Hādhā kitābu ḍiyāʼin fī al-qulūbi akhī // akrim bimā fīhi min ʻilmin wa-min adabi. Sammaytuhu bi-al-Ḍiyā idh kāna fīhi hudan // min al-ʻamá wa-ḍiyā min ẓulmati al-ʻaṭabi. Khaṣaṣtu nafsī bi-hi ḥubban wa-maʻrifatan // la-hu wa-ṣannaftuhu min aṣdaqi al-kutubi ..." And ends with: "... Ḥamāniya Allāhu min zayghin wa-min zalalin // ʻumrī wa-ʻallamanī ʻilman wa-ʻallama bī. Tammat al-abyāt al-mansūbah ilá Abī al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi."

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: On folio 7b: "al-Juzʼ al-awwal. Fī ṭalab al-ʻilm, min Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah, al-wariʻ al-ḥabr al-fahhāmah, Abī al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi. Wa-yatlūhhu, in shāʼa Allāh, al-juzʼ al-thānī min Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ, fīmā yajūzu min al-ṣifāt, taʼlīf al-Shaykh Abī al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī."

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: On folio 8b-9a: Table of contents (in 28 chapters)

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: Colophon (folio 261): "Tammat al-qiṭʻah al-ūlá min Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ, fī ṭalab al-ʻilm wa-fī shayʼ min al-tawḥīd, bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥamdih, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Muḥammad khayr khalqih wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi ṣabāḥ al-Jumʻah al-zahrāʼ, sāʻat al-Qamar, li-ithnatay ʻashrata laylatin khalat min shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat sabʻ sinīn wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah wa-alf sanah min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [18 January 1715]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. ʻAlá yaday al-ʻabd al-aqall al-faqīr lillāh ʻazza wa-jall, Maḥbūb ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻīd ibn Rāshid al-Miʻwalī, fī ʻaṣr al-Imām al-ʻadl Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn al-Imām Sulṭān ibn Sayf al-Yaʻrubī, aʻazzahu Allāh wa-naṣarahu, lil-Shaykh al-Wālī al-walī al-muwālī, al-ʻadl al-raḍī, Aḥmad ibn Sulaymān ibn Aḥmad al-ʻĀtī al-Manaḥī, razaqahu Allāh ḥifẓahu wa-al-ʻamal bi-mā fīhi."

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: On the right margin of the colophon: "ʻUriḍa ʻalá nuskhatihi allatī nusikha minhā bi-ḥasb al-ṭāqah wa-al-imkān bi-Ḥiṣn Qaryat Izkī. Katabahu mālikuhu min faḍl mālikihi, Aḥmad ibn Sulaymān ibn Aḥmad al-ʻĀtī al-Manaḥī bi-yadihi, 14 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1127 [20 March 1715]."

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: On folio 262b: A poem (in 12 verses) by al-Muqannaʻ al-Kindī (Muḥammad ibn ʻUmayrah, -approximately 690).

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḍiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Mundhir Salamah ibn Muslim ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻUmānī al-ʻAwtabī al-Ṣuḥārī ̄.
note: On folio 264b: A poem (in 9 verses) by Khalaf ibn Sinān.

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
note: Copied 15 Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, of the year 1021 of the Hijrah (15 June 1612), by Sulṭān ibn al-Imām Sayf ibn Sulṭān. Place of copying not mentioned.

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
note: Incipit (folio 3b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ʻalayhi natawakkalu, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutaṣarrif qabla ʻilal al-taṣrīf, al-mutaʻarrif qabla ālat al-taʻrīf, alladhī allafa al-ashyāʼ aḥsana taʼlīf, wa-ḥammala al-insān amānat al-taklīf, wa-sharrafa al-ʻilm wa-ahlahu akmal al-tashrīf, aḥmaduhu ʻalá jamīʻ niʻamihi wa-afḍālih, ḥamdan yalīqu bi-karam wajhihi wa-ʻizz jalālih ..."

note: Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
note: On folio 1b: An advice, by a reader/owner: "Hāka nuṣḥī in kunta targhabu fīhi, wa-maqālī in kunta mimman yaʻīhi, lā takun lābisan wa-anta ḥaqīr thawba kibarin wa-sāḥiban dhaylahu. Tamma hādhā al-ithbāt (?) bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Jabbār. Wa-katabahu Aḥmad ibn Nāṣir bi-yadihi."

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
note: Colophon (folio 110b): "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh taʻālá, fī al-yawm al-khāmis ʻashar min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat 1021 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah [15 June 1612], bi-qalam al-faqīr ilá Allāh Sulṭān ibn al-Imām Sayf ibn Sulṭān, bi-yadihi. Nasakhahu li-waladihi wa-ʻarīn al-thiqah Nāṣir ibn Aḥmad ibn Tamīm ibn Aḥmad al-Rustāqī, razaqahu Allāh ḥifẓahu wa-al-ʻamal bimā fīhi. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
note: On the right margin of the colophon: Partially obliterated ownership statement: "Hādhā al-kitāb lil-Shaykh al-thiqah [... ... ...]. Wa-katabahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh [... ...] li-yaʻlam al-wāqif ʻalayhi man mālikuhu (?)."

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
note: On folio 111a: An unidentified text on morphology, titled "Nubdhah fī al-taṣrīf", by Sulṭān ibn al-Imām Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Mālik.

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
note: On folio 111b: An invocation (in crude script).

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
note: On folios 113a-116b (in a different hand): An unidentified long poem on "Tafsīr al-ruʼyā" (Interpretation of dreams). It starts with: al-Ḥamdu lillāhi bārī al-khalqi wa-al-ṣuwari // wa-bāsiṭi al-rizqi lil-anʻāmi wa-al-bashari. Wa-kull khalqin barāhu Allāhu rāziquhu // wa-Huwa al-ghanīyu ilāhun ghayru muftaqiri. Wa-huwa al-Qadīm wa-kullu al-khalqi aḥdathahu // bi-lā mithālin wa-lākin fiʻlu muqtadiri ..." It ends with: "... Abyātuhā miʼatun maʻa tisʻatin ʻadadan // wa-sittatun baʻdahā jāʼat ʻalá al-athari. Hādhā wa-ṣallá ilāhu al-ʻālamīn ʻalá // Muḥammadin khayri mabʻūthin ʻalá al-bashari. Wa-ālihi al-ghurri wa-al-aṭhāri innahumu // khayru al-barīyati min badwin wa-min ḥaḍari."

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
880-03 Fatḥ al-aqfāl wa-ḥall al-ishkāl bi-Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharḥ al-kabīr : manuscript / Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Baḥraq.
note: On folio 119b: 1. Scribbles. 2. A borrowing note of the book: "Akhadhtu hādhā al-kitāb bi-al-ʻāriyah al-mardūdah ilá ahlihā, wa-huwa min ʻind al-akh Ḥāmid ibn Muḥammad ibn Tamīm. Wa-katabahu afqar al-ʻibād al-aqall lillāh ʻabduhu Ḥamad ibn Nāṣir ibn Sulaymān ibn Walīd bi-yadihi. Tārīkh nahār 16 min shahr Ramaḍān, sanat 1239 [15 May 1824]." 3. Two unidentified verses of poetry: "Idhā lam takun arḍī li-ʻirḍī maṣūnatun // raḥaltu wa-law nādat fa-lastu ujībuhā. Raḥaltu ilá dārin siwāhā tuʻuzzunī // wa-law kāna yaʻwī lī min al-jūʻi dhībuhā."

title: 880-03 Kitāb Shamāʼil al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-akhlāquhu wa-afʻāluhu : manuscript / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām Abī ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
note: Copied on a Friday morning (day and month not mentioned), of the year 1253 of the Hijrah (1837 or 1838), in the city of Zabīd (Yemen), by Muḥammad Yāsīn al-Ḥabashī.

title: 880-03 Kitāb Shamāʼil al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-akhlāquhu wa-afʻāluhu : manuscript / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām Abī ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
880-03 Kitāb Shamāʼil al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-akhlāquhu wa-afʻāluhu : manuscript / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām Abī ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīn iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sūrah al-Tirmidhī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Bāb mā jāʼa fī khalq Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, akhbaranā Abū Rajāʼ Qutaybah ibn Saʻd, ʻan Mālik ibn Anas, ʻan Rabīʻah ibn Abī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, ʻan Anas ibn Mālik, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, annahu samiʻahu yaqūlu: Kāna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, laysa bi-al-ṭawīl al-bāʼin wa-lā bi-al-qaṣīr al-mutaraddid, wa-lā bi-al-abyaḍ al-amhaq, wa-lā bi-al-jaʻid al-qaṭiṭ, wa-lā bi-al-sibṭ, baʻathahu Allāh taʻālá ʻalá raʼs arbaʻīn sanah, fa-aqāma bi-Makkah ʻashr sinīn, wa-bi-al-Madīnah ʻashr sinīn, fa-tawaffāhu Allāh taʻālá ʻalá raʼs sittīn sanah ..."

title: 880-03 Kitāb Shamāʼil al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-akhlāquhu wa-afʻāluhu : manuscript / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām Abī ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
note: Script: In coarse medium naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

title: 880-03 Kitāb Shamāʼil al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-akhlāquhu wa-afʻāluhu : manuscript / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām Abī ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.

title: 880-03 Kitāb Shamāʼil al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-akhlāquhu wa-afʻāluhu : manuscript / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām Abī ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
note: Colophon: "Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, fa-li-Allāh al-ḥamd ʻalá dhālik. Bi-raqm al-faqīr ilá Allāh Muḥammad Yāsīn al-Ḥabashī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ mashāyikhihi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-dhālika nahār al-Jumʻah, waqt al-ḍuḥá, bi-Madīnat Zabīd al-maḥmīyah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Sanat 1253 [1837/1838]."

title: 880-03 Kitāb Shamāʼil al-Nabī ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-akhlāquhu wa-afʻāluhu : manuscript / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām Abī ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
note: On the back of the wrapping sheet: A delivery note: "Ilá Madīnat Zabīd. Sullima bi-yad al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar Yāsīn al-Jabartī fī bayt Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Sulaymān."

title: 880-02 Kitāb Kanz al-ḥaqāʼiq fī Ḥadīth Khayr al-Khalāʼiq : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī.
note: The manuscript is incomplete. Name of copyist and place and date of copying not mentioned, probably from the 19th century.

title: 880-02 Kitāb Kanz al-ḥaqāʼiq fī Ḥadīth Khayr al-Khalāʼiq : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī.
880-02 Kitāb Kanz al-ḥaqāʼiq fī Ḥadīth Khayr al-Khalāʼiq : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī.
note: On folio 1a: "Kitāb Kanz al-ḥaqāʼiq fī Ḥadīth Khayr al-Khalāʼiq, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām ʻalam al-aʼimmah al-aʻlām, al-ḥāfiẓ al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq ʻAbd al-Raʼūf al-Munāwī, raḥimahu Allāh raḥmat al-abrār, wa-askanahu jannāt tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhār, bi-ḥaqq Nabīyihi al-Mukhtār, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam."

title: 880-02 Kitāb Kanz al-ḥaqāʼiq fī Ḥadīth Khayr al-Khalāʼiq : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-tammim. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī kasā ahl al-Ḥadīth burd al-sharaf fī kull iqlīm, wa-rafaʻa shaʼnahum, wa-aʻlá dhikrahum fī kull ḥadīth wa-qadīm, wa-ḥaffahum min bayn jumlat al-sharʻ bi-mazīd al-tashrīf wa-al-taʻẓīm ... Wa-baʻd, yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-qāʼim ʻalá qadam al-taqṣīr, ʻAbd al-Raʼūf al-Munāwī: Hādhā kitābun ʻujāb, man taʼammalahu dakhalat ʻalayhi al-masarrah min kull bāb, jamaʻtu fīhi ʻashrat ālāf Ḥadīth fī ʻashrat karārīs, kull kurrās alf Ḥadīth, fī kull waraqah miʼah Ḥadīth ... wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam ..."

title: 880-02 Kitāb Kanz al-ḥaqāʼiq fī Ḥadīth Khayr al-Khalāʼiq : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī.
note: Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; some catchwords.

note: Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... Nawm al-ʻālim ʻibādah wa-nafasuhu tasbīḥ. Nawmun ʻalá ʻilm khayr min ṣalāh ʻalá jahl. Nīyat al-muʼmin khayrun min ʻamalih. Faṣl al-Muḥallá bi-al-: al-Nāʼiḥah malʻūnah min ḥīn takhruju min baytihā ḥattá tarjaʻa ..."

title: 880-01 al-Tuḥaf al-ʻalīyah fī al-khuṭab al-minbarīyah : manuscript.
note: Name of the author could not be identified. Name of the copyist and place and date of copying not mentioned, probably from the 19th century.

title: 880-01 al-Tuḥaf al-ʻalīyah fī al-khuṭab al-minbarīyah : manuscript.
880-01 al-Tuḥaf al-ʻalīyah fī al-khuṭab al-minbarīyah : manuscript.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa al-khuṭabā ʻalá aʻlā al-manābir, wa-jaʻaltahum [wa-jaʻalahum] qudwatan lil-ʻālamīn al-aṣfiyā wa-al-akābir ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an aʻmala dīwānan fī al-khuṭab yashtamilu ʻalá ʻadad shuhūr al-sanah, fa-ajabtuhu li-suʼālihi, rājiyan min Allāh al-thawāb ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-'al-Tuḥaf al-ʻalīyah fī al-khuṭab al-minbarīyah' ..."

note: Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on white thick paper; few notes on the margins; catchwords.

title: 880-01 al-Tuḥaf al-ʻalīyah fī al-khuṭab al-minbarīyah : manuscript.
note: Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Jāʼa fī al-Ḥadīth, ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāla: Faraḍa Allāh ʻalayya wa-ʻalá ummatī laylata al-isrá khamsīn ṣalātan fa-lam azal urājiʻuhu wa-asʼaluhu al-takhfīf ḥattá jaʻalahā khamsan fī kull yawm wa-laylah, wa-qāla hiya khamsun wa-hunna khamsūn, lā yubaddalu al-qawl ladayya wa-lā yunsakhu Kitābī. Tamma hādhā al-dīwān al-mubbārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi."

title: 880-03 al-Tabṣirah wa-al-tadhkirah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn al-ʻIrāqī.
note: Name of copyist and place and date of copying not mentioned, probably from the 18th century.

title: 880-03 al-Tabṣirah wa-al-tadhkirah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn al-ʻIrāqī.
880-03 al-Tabṣirah wa-al-tadhkirah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn al-ʻIrāqī.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir. Yaqūlu rājī Rabbihi al-Muqtadiri // ʻAbd al-Raḥīmi ibn al-Ḥusayni al-Atharī. Min baʻdi ḥamdi Allāhi dhī al-ālāʼi // ʻalá imtinānin jalla ʻan iḥṣāʼi. Thumma ṣalātin wa-salāmin dāʼimin // ʻalá Nabīyi al-khayri dhī al-marāḥimi. Fa-hādhihi al-maqāṣidu al-muhimmah // tūḍiḥu min ʻilmi al-Ḥadīthi rasmah. Naẓamtuhā 'tabṣiratan' lil-mubtadī // 'tadhkiratan' lil-muntahī wa-al-musnidī. Lakhkhaṣtu fīhā Ibna al-Ṣalāḥi ajmaʻah // wa-zidtuhā ʻilman tarāhu mawḍiʻah ..."

note: Colophon: The text ends as follows: "... Wa-kamulat bi-Ṭaybata al-maymūnah // fa-barazat min khidrihā maṣūnah. Fa-Rabbunā al-maḥmūdu wa-al-mashkūru // ilayhi minnā tarjiʻu al-umūru. Wa-afḍalu al-ṣalāti wa-al-salāmi // ʻalá al-Nabīyi Sayyidi al-anām. Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusni tawfīqihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi."

note: Copied on Sunday, nine nights having passed from the month of Ramaḍān, of the year 1159 of the Hijrah (25 September 1746), by Khalfān ibn Khālid ibn Khalfān ibn Mahdī ibn Saʻīd ibn Jabr (Khayr?) ibn ʻAlī ibn Salīṭah (?) ibn Sulaymān ibn Khuṭām al-Sāʻidī nasaban wa-al-Ibāḍī madhhaban, copied for his patron al-Faqīh al-ʻĀlim Bajād ibn Sālim ibn Bajād ibn Sālim al-Ghāfirī. Place of copying not mentioned.

title: 880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā ilāha illā Huwa, laysa ka-mithlihi shayʼ, wa-Huwa al-samiʻ [al-samīʻ] al-baṣīr, fa-nafsuhu dhātuhu, wa-dhātuhu ithbātuhu, wa-Huwa al-ʻalim [al-ʻalīm] al-qadīr, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad al-Nabī, wa-ʻalá ālihi, wa-Huwa al-bashīr al-nadhīr, wa-sallama taslīman. Bāb fī al-buyūʻ wa-mā yajūzu minhā wa-mā lā yajūz ..."

title: 880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
note: Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on polished white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

title: 880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
note: Decoration: Headings and markings in red.

title: 880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
note: Binding: In dark brown leather, Type II (with flap); cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

title: 880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
note: Inside the front cover: "Min kitāb al-muṣannif: Wa-idhā tanāzaʻa Ahl al-Dhimmah wa-al-Muslimūn fī amwāl kānat al-khuṣūmah baynahum fī dhālika ka-al-khuṣūmah wa-al-ḥukm bayna al-Muslimīn. Wa-qāla Muḥammad ibn Maḥbūb qawlan yadullu ʻalá ghayr hādhā fī Dhimmī ishtará mālan min Muslim, jāza an yuʼkhadha minhu shafʻat al-Islām wa-in lam yakun jāran lil-māl, wa-kadhālika law wajaba ʻalá maytin ḥaqq li-Muslim wa-ḥaqq li-Dhimmī annahu yadfaʻu ilá al-Dhimmī mā faḍula min al-māl baʻda istīfāʼ al-Muslim ḥaqqahu. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Katabahu Saʻīd ibn Sālim ibn Saʻīd bi-yadihi."

title: 880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
note: On folio 3a: An ownership statement: "Ishtaraytu hādhā al-kitāb min Sūq al-Muslimīn min Bandar Muskad min ʻind Ḥaydar Jadīd bi-thalāth ʻashar Muḥammadīyah bayāḍ wa-kasr, wa-anā al-faqīr lillāh taʻālá Aḥmad ibn Ḥammād ibn Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Basṭ, fī 11 Rajab, sanat 1260 [27 July 1844]."

title: 880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
note: On folio 3b-4b: Table of contents "Tartīb al-abwāb li-hādhā al-kitāb". At the end of the table of contents: "Tammat al-abwāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb. Hādhā al-kitāb 'Baṣīrat al-aḥkām' taʼlīf al-Faqīh al-ajall, al-ʻālim al-afḍal, Abī Muḥammad ʻUthmān ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Aṣamm, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Katabahu ʻAbd Allāh Bajād ibn Sālim bi-yadihi. Badaʼnā taṣḥīḥ hādhā al-kitāb laylat al-Thulāthāʼ, 7 al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1159 [21 December 1746]."

title: 880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
note: Colophon (folio 106a): "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr khalqih, Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-kāna tamāmuhu fī yawm al-Aḥad, li-tisʻ layālin khalawna min shahr Ramaḍān al-sharīf, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1159 [25 September 1746] min al-Hijrah al-Islāmīyah, ʻalá muhājirihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-aqall lillāh ʻazza wa-jall, Khalfān ibn Khālid ibn Khalfān ibn Mahdī ibn Saʻīd ibn Jabr (?) ibn ʻAlī ibn Salīṭah (?) ibn Sulaymān ibn Khuṭām al-Sāʻidī nasaban wa-al-Ibāḍī madhhaban, nasakhahu li-Sayyidihi wa-Walīyihi al-Faqīh al-ʻĀlim Bajād ibn Sālim ibn Bajād ibn Sālim al-Ghāfirī, razaqahu Allāh ḥifẓahu wa-al-ʻamal bimā fīhi, innahu walī dhālika wa-al-qādir ʻalayhi. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad al-Nabī, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
note: Under the colophon: Collation statement: "ʻUriḍa ʻalá nuskhatihi allatī nusikha minhā ʻalá ḥasb al-ṭāqah wa-al-makān [wa-al-imkān], wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-ṣiḥḥatihi, wa-kāna tamām dhālika laylat al-Arbiʻāʼ, 1 al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1159 [15 December 1746]."

title: 880-02 Kitāb Baṣīrat al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Abī ʻUbayd Allāh al-Aṣamm.
note: On folio 106b-107a: Miscellaneous "fatwas" (legal opinions) by several Islamic law scholars.

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Tartīb : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Wārjalānī.
note: Copied on Thursday, 7 Muḥarram, of the year 1114 of the Hijrah (3 June 1702), by Mubārak ibn Rāshid ibn Makram ibn Rashid al-Makramī al-Rustāqī, during the reign of Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Mālik ibn Abī al-ʻArab al-Yaʻrubī. Place of copying "Baldatatā (baldatinā (?) min al-Sanad (al-Sind)" could not be identified.

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Tartīb : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Wārjalānī.
880-02 Kitāb al-Tartīb : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Wārjalānī.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Juzʼ al-awwal min 'Kitāb al-Tartīb', mimmā rattabahu al-Shaykh al-awḥad, al-raʼīs al-amjad al-afḍal, Abū Yaʻqūb Yūsuf ibn Abī Ibrāhīm ibn Munādī al-Sidārātī al-Ibāḍī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad al-Nabī, wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Bāb fī al-nīyah: Qāla Abū ʻAmr al-Rabīʻ ibn Ḥabīb ibn ʻAmr al-Baṣrī: Ḥaddathanī Abū ʻUbaydah Muslim ibn Abī Karīmah al-Tamīmī ʻan Jābir ibn Zayd al-Azdī ʻan ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbbās ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayh wa-sallam 'Nīyatu al-muʼmin khayrun min ʻamalih' ..."

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Tartīb : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Wārjalānī.
note: Script: In fair naskh script; in black ink, on cream color paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Tartīb : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Wārjalānī.
note: Inside the front cover: An ownership statement: "Hādhā al-kitāb al-musammá al-Tartīb malakahu [...] Aḥmad ibn Ḥammād ibn Muḥammad ibn Sālim ibn Khamīs [...] ibn Khālid ibn Ḥasan ibn Ibrāhīm [...] ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Basaṭ [...]. Katabahu bi-yadihi yawm 23 Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat 1253 [25 August 1837], wa-ʻalá Allāh al-tawakkul (?) [...]. Hādhā al-kitāb Naʻam huwa li-Aḥmad [...]. Katabahu Sulaymān ibn Sālim [...]."

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Tartīb : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Wārjalānī.
note: On preliminary leaf 1a: Two black square stamps (partially legible).

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Tartīb : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Wārjalānī.
note: Colophon (folio 237b-238a): "Tamma al-juzʼ al-rābiʻ min Kitāb al-Tartīb min al-ṣaḥīḥ fī Ḥadīth Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi nahār al-Khamīs, tārīkh sābiʻ min shahr al-Muḥarram, min shuhūr sanat arbaʻ ʻashrah sanah wa-miʼat sanah wa-alf sanah [3 June 1702], min Hijrat al-Nabī Muḥammad, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-kāna tamāmuhu (naskhuhu) fī Baldatatā [baldatinā (?)] min al-Sanad [al-Sind(?)], wa-dhālika fī ʻaṣr Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā, Imām al-Muslimīn, Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Mālik ibn Abī al-ʻArab al-Yaʻrubī, naṣarahu Allāh ʻalá jamīʻ aʻdāʼihi. Wa-kātibuhu al-faqīr lillāh taʻālá, al-aqall, khādim al-Imām al-muqaddam dhikruhu, al-faqīr Mubārak ibn Rāshid ibn Makram ibn Rāshid al-Makramī al-Rustāqī. Asʼalu Allāh an yarzuqanī al-ʻamal bi-mā fīhi wa-yatajāwaza ʻannī, innahu ghafūrun raḥīm."

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Tartīb : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Wārjalānī.
note: On folio 238b: An ownership statement: "Hādhā al-kitāb <ilá> li-ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥamad ibn Saʻīd (?) ibn Thānī (?) bi-al-shirāʼ min ʻind Rāshid ibn Muḥammad ibn Rāshid ibn Khaṣīb al-Riyāʼī (?) al-Bahlawī al-Riyāʼī yaskunu al-Ghāf wa-al-dallāl (?) Sālimīn ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻīd (?) ibn Muqniʻ al-Saʻālī al-Nazwī, yawm 15 Shaʻbān, sanat 34 (1134) [31 May 1722], fī ʻaṣr al-Imām Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Sulṭān ibn Sayf ibn Mālik al-Yaʻrubī, aʻazzahu Allāh wa-naṣarahu, fī awwal Mulkihi ʻaqib al-Imām Yaʻrub."

note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ʻāfiyah lil-muttaqīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabbī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam, ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yajibu ʻalá al-ʻabd awwala an yaʻrifa al-īmān wa-al-Islām. Fa-in qīla laka mā awwal shayʼ yajibu ʻalá al-insān, fa-qul ʻalá kull mukallaf an yaʻrifa annahu makhlūq, wa-anna la-hu khāliqan wa-rāziqan wa-huwa Allāh alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa, thumma yajibu ʻalayhi an yaʻrifa al-īmān wa-al-Islām, li-anna saʻādat [al-]dārayn lā yakūnu illā bihimā ..."

title: Principles of faith in Islam : manuscript.

title: Principles of faith in Islam : manuscript.
note: Colophon: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... wa-ammā alladhīn lam yasjud wa-lam yandam hum alladhīn yūladūn kāfiran wa-yamūtūna kāfiran. Allāhumma lā tajʻalnā minhum, fa-hum sabab ṣāra al-nās arbaʻat al-ṭawāʼif. Allāhumma ijʻalnā wa-īyākum min alladhīn al-ṭāʼifah alladhīn yūladūna Muslimīn wa-yamūtūna Muslimīn, bi-barakat Nabīyinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, wa-ijʻalnā min al-tābiʻīn lahum qawlan wa-fiʻlan. Āmīn. Tamma al-kitāb."

title: 880-03 Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī.
note: Copied on Friday, 23 Muḥarram, of the year 1195 of the Hijrah (19 January 1781), by ʻUmar ibn Sulaymān. Place of copying not mentioned.

title: 880-03 Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī.
880-03 Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Raʼīs Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Baʻda ḥamd Allāh alladhī ʻamma ʻibādahu bi-waẓāʼif al-ʻawārif, wa-khaṣṣa man shāʼa minhum bi-laṭāʼif al-maʻārif, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad al-ʻāqib, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ulī al-manāqib, fa-innī raʼytu kathīran mimman tasannamū asnimat al-rutab wa-tawassamū simatan qad ḍāhaw al-ʻāmmah fī baʻḍ mā yafruṭu min kalāmihim ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ' ..."

title: 880-03 Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī.

title: 880-03 Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī.
note: On folio 1a: Two popular medicinal recipes, and two ownership statements: 1. "Hādhā al-kitāb lī, wa-huwa fī milkī, wa-anā al-ḥaqīr Aḥmad ibn Ḥammād ibn Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Basṭ, ḥurrira bi-yadihi (?), 8 Ṣafar, sanat 1260 [28 February 1844]." 2. "Hādhā al-kitāb, wa-huwa fī milkī, wa-anā al-ḥaqīr Aḥmad ibn Ḥammād ibn Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Basṭ. Fī shahr Ṣafar, ḥurrira fī yawm thāmin, fī sanat 1260 [28 February 1844]. Wa-katabahu al-ḥaqīr Saʻd ibn Nāṣir ibn ʻAbd al-Rasūl."

title: 880-03 Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī.

title: 880-03 Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī.

title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
note: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-islām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad Nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā bi-hi min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām. Wa-baʻd hādhā, fa-al-gharaḍ fī hādhā al-kitāb dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-faḍāʼilihā, nadhkuruhā maḥdhūfat al-asānīd li-yashula ḥifẓuhā ʻalá al-qāriʼ, wa-hiya min ahamma al-muhimmāt li-man yurīdu al-qurb min Rabb al-Arbāb. Wa-sammaytuhu bi-kitāb "Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār" ibitghāʼan li-marḍāt Allāh taʻālá wa-maḥabbatan fī Rasūlihi al-Karīm ..."

title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
note: Secundo folio: dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-faḍāʼilihā.

title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
note: Colophon: No colophon. The text of "Dalāʼil al-khayrāt" ends on folio 75a with an invocation, as follows: "... Wa-nasʼaluka Allāhumma bi-nūr wajhika alladhī malaʼa arkān ʻarshika an tazraʻa fī qalbī maʻrifatika ḥattá aʻrifaka ḥaqqa maʻrifatika, kamā yanbaghī an tuʻrafa bi-hi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyin wa-imām al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."

title: Stephen Vincent Benét letter, to Major Pond, 1928 September : manuscript.
Stephen Vincent Benét letter, to Major Pond, 1928 September : manuscript.
note: This letter is addressed to Major Pond, but Benét may have forgotten, or was unaware, that Major James B. Pond had passed away in 1903. James Barton Pond, Jr. ran his father's lecture managment company after his father's death, and this may be who Benét was intending to address in this letter.

title: Stephen Vincent Benét letter, to Major Pond, 1928 September : manuscript.

title: Stephen Vincent Benét letter, to Major Pond, 1928 September : manuscript.
note: Date is taken from a answered stamp on the letter, dated September 17, 1928, indicating that Pond had answered Benét's letter on that date.

T. on which are formulated the tenets of the Jacobite Monophysites of Mesopotamia. It is entitled The Book of Questions. The answers, it is but just to say, are not generally accepted by this sect at present. A small gift to the American Oriental Society, New Haven, CT."
